named-query.name: City.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM city c WHERE c.id_city = :idCity

named-query.name: Client.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM client c WHERE c.id_client = :idClient

named-query.name: Department.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM department d WHERE d.id_department = :idDepartment

named-query.name: Invoice.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM invoice i WHERE i.id_invoie = :idInvoice

named-query.name: Product.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM product p WHERE p.id_product = :idProduct

named-query.name: Stock.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM stock s WHERE s.id_stock = :idStock

named-query.name: Supplier.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM supplier s WHERE s.id_supplier = :idSupplier

named-query.name: Warehouse.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM warehouse w WHERE w.id_warehouse = :idWarehouse
